title: How to Make a Butterfinger Dessert

steps.headline: Combine 1/2 of the crushed crackers with soft butter.
Spray a 9 x 13-inch (23 x 33 cm) baking pan with nonstick cooking spray.
Line the prepared pan with the cracker mixture.
Spread Cool Whip over top of pudding.
Strew remaining crushed cracker mixture over Cool Whip.
Top with crushed Butterfinger candy bars.

text: Combine 1/2 of the crushed crackers with soft butter.  Spray a 9 x 13-inch (23 x 33 cm) baking pan with nonstick cooking spray.  Line the prepared pan with the cracker mixture.  Whisk together pudding and milk. Pour over graham cracker mixture. Spread Cool Whip over top of pudding.  Strew remaining crushed cracker mixture over Cool Whip.  Top with crushed Butterfinger candy bars.  Cover pan and freeze.  Finished.
